pkgmetadata.longdescription:
LM Studio is a desktop application for discovering, downloading, and running large language models (LLMs) locally on your computer. It provides a user-friendly interface for working with various open-source language models without requiring cloud services or subscriptions.
Features include: - Run popular LLMs locally (GPT-OSS, Qwen, Gemma, DeepSeek, and more) - Private and offline operation - no data sent to the cloud - Cross-platform support with native performance - OpenAI-compatible API server for integration with existing tools - Python and JavaScript SDKs for programmatic access - Command-line interface (lms) for automation - Model management and download capabilities - Free for both personal and commercial use
The application is built on Electron and provides GPU acceleration support for improved performance when running models. Models are downloaded on-demand and stored locally in the user's home directory.

use.flag: Enable Wayland support (experimental). When enabled, provides better integration with Wayland compositors, though X11/XWayland is still supported as a fallback.
